entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
